comments.en:
Dye-sublimation printer, 310dpi, 24bit color depth, max. paper size 4x6in/10x15cm, laminate overcoat, full-bleed (border-less). Does not print on normal paper, so it is not suitable for documents, it is only for photos.

Can print directly from digital camera (PictBridge compatible), USB connection.

Consumables/Refills: Packs with special paper and three-color ribbon
